definitions.title: n.f. denom.
definitions.body: what belongs to a contribution, attendant or secondary contribution, subdivision (on form. v. Kö:ii. 1:204; strictly adj. (used as subst.), Ges:§ 86 h);—´[[ת]]: [[מִתְּרוּמַת הָאָרֶץ]] Ez Eze 48:12, of strip of land for priests in Ezekiel’s scheme (but rd. prob. [[תְּרוּמָה]]).
